summary: The transforms package defines an abstract framework for modifying a knowledge graph, implements a default pipeline that extracts titles, headlines, summaries, keyphrases and embeddings, builds similarity‑based relationships and splits headlines, and provides an engine that runs these components asynchronously with parallel execution and rollback capabilities, enabling systematic creation of RAG test sets.
business_intent: Automate the generation of robust test datasets for Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG) models by programmatically transforming knowledge graphs.
